body.p: Major, 1st Cavalry Regiment, Indiana Volunteers. Son of John Gavitt and Alice Smith. Father of John Smith Gavitt, William Gavitt, and Joseph Gavitt. Sheriff of Vanderburgh County, Indiana, from 1853 to 1857 and from 1859 to 1861. Major in 1st Indiana Volunteer Cavalry Regiment from August 20, 1861 to October 21, 1861. Lieutenant Colonel in 1st Indiana Volunteer Cavalry Regiment on October 21, 1861. Killed in battle at Fredericktown, Missouri, on October 21, 1861.
